## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d5ae86bb92ecda0b9d67bf6bcb933e00f57e91de9916d1b3a3ad5a68993c0778)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'discomusic' @ 0.0.3 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
